name: com.kaijusolutions.agents.behavior
description: Integration for the Unity Behavior package with Kaiju Agents.

samples.description:
Behavior integrations for the "Box Destroyer" sample.

You must also import the "Box Destroyer" and "Materials" samples from the core Kaiju Agents package for this to work.

Behavior integrations for the "Microbes" exercise.

You must also import the "Microbes" exercise and "Materials" sample from the core Kaiju Agents package for this to work.

Behavior integrations for the "Capture the Flag" exercise.

You must also import the "Capture the Flag" exercise and "Materials" sample from the core Kaiju Agents package for this to work.
